alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Rush (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Rush and northeastern Decatur Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rushville, or 16 miles east of Shelbyville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Rush and northeastern Decatur Counties, including the following locations... Lake Santee, Milroy, Clarksburg, Moscow and New Salem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
